name: Class MGF1ParameterSpec
codes:
public class MGF1ParameterSpec
extends Object
implements AlgorithmParameterSpec

fields.description: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-1" message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-224" message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-256" message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-384" message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses SHA-512 message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses SHA-512/224 message digest
The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses SHA-512/256 message digest

methods.description:
Returns the algorithm name of the message digest used by the mask
 generation function.
